pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: No hidden fees. Pay only for what you use.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: A virtual number is a temporary phone number that can receive SMS verification without requiring a physical SIM card.
faq.q2: How long does the number stay active?
faq.a2: For activations, the number stays active for 20 minutes. For rentals, you choose the duration (1 day to 1 month).
faq.q3: Can I use the same number multiple times?
faq.a3: No, each activation uses a new unique number to guarantee privacy.
faq.q4: What happens if I don't receive the SMS?
faq.a4: If no SMS is received, your credit is automatically refunded to your account.
faq.q5: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a5: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum) and bank transfers.
faq.a6: Yes, our virtual numbers are 100% legal and compliant with international regulations.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say

testimonials.testimonial3: Exceptional customer support. They solved my problem in 5 minutes. Really professional.

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.subtitle: One SMS Platform
howToUse.description: Get virtual phone numbers for SMS verification in just a few simple steps. No SIM card required, instant delivery.
howToUse.stepsDescription: Follow these steps to receive your first verification code

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up for free with your email address or Google account. Verification is instant.
step1.tip1: Use a valid email to receive important notifications
step1.tip2: Google sign-in is the fastest option

step2.title: Add Credits
step2.description: Top up your account balance using various payment methods. Credits never expire.
step2.tip1: Start with a small amount to test the service

step3.title: Choose a Service
step3.description: Select the platform you need verification for: WhatsApp, Telegram, Instagram, and 500+ more.
step3.tip2: Use the search bar for quick access

step4.title: Select a Country
step4.description: Pick the country for your virtual number. Prices vary by country and availability.
step4.tip1: Countries with high success rates are highlighted
step4.tip2: Some services work better with specific countries

step5.title: Wait for SMS
step5.description: Once activated, wait for the verification SMS. Most arrive within 30 seconds.
step5.tip1: Keep the page open - codes appear automatically
step5.tip2: You have 20 minutes to receive the code

step6.title: Copy Your Code
step6.description: Click on the received code to copy it automatically. Paste it on the target platform.
step6.tip1: Codes are displayed clearly in blue boxes
step6.tip2: If no SMS arrives, you get an automatic refund

howToUse.featuresDescription: Built for speed, security, and reliability

security.title: 100% Secure
security.description: Your data is encrypted and never shared with third parties

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Receive SMS codes in under 30 seconds on average

refund.title: Auto Refund
refund.description: No SMS received? Your credits are automatically refunded

availability.title: 24/7 Available
availability.description: Service available round the clock, every day of the year

faq1.title: What payment methods are accepted?
faq1.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT) and bank transfers. All payments are secure and processed instantly.

faq2.title: What if I don't receive the SMS?
faq2.answer: If no verification code is received within the 20-minute window, your credits are automatically refunded to your account. No manual action required!

faq3.title: How long are numbers active?
faq3.answer: For one-time activations, numbers stay active for 20 minutes. For rentals, you choose the duration: 4 hours, 1 day, 1 week, or 1 month.

howToUse.ctaDescription: Join thousands of users who trust One SMS for their verification needs
